#28 in Car Audio Receivers
Date First Available November 3, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $119.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:48:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SjoyBring M005 7 Inch Double Din Car Stereo

M005 Double Din Car Stereo features with a 7-inch capacitive touch screen, a user-friendly interface and modern functions design for your comfort and entertainment during driving trip.

From listening to FM AM Radio, casting the map navigating from your phone to big screen, keeping your passengers enjoy a movie in the trip, taking Bluetooth hands-free phone calls and even parking your car safely and fast, M005 car stereo will be your best driving partner!

Easy DIY installation, compatible with most car models7 inch HD LCD monitor, With Resolution 1024*600Compatible with Android and IOS phones for Mirror-LinkSupports Front/rear view camera video Input and Video outputBluetooth hands-free calling and audio streamIncludes rear camera, wireless remoteUSB for fast phone charging Built-in 16-band EQ settingsStylish 7 color Led buttonsSupports Steering Wheel ControlPre-amp & subwoofer outputsWorking Voltage: DC 12V; Max power output: 4x 60watt

Safer Parking

Our reversing rear camera adopts BMW interface, can make the connection more secure, more stable, simpler, much better than similar products.

Easy operation and wiring, easy operation and help driver a safe and easier parking.

Package includes an HD rear camera with night vision, a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle and a full waterproof design. The JOY-M005 was designed having your safety and comfort in mind, supporting rear and front view camera with an automatic display of image when in reverse.

Mirror Link for Android & IOS

Compatible with Android phones and IOS phones (No version limit). The function allows you to cast what’s displayed on your phone to the car stereo screen via original USB interface, easily realize map navigation, watch movies, etc.

Please Note:

1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function.

2. Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.

Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-clear MIC

With the updated Bluetooth 5.2, which is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, you can take and make calls in seconds by pairing it with your smartphone. Listen to your favorite music services and apps with the wireless Bluetooth audio stream, control tracks, volume and play / pause with a simple touch of a button.

Ultra-clear built-in microphone, hassle-free noise when making a phone call, so you can make a phone call easily while focusing on the road.

Full HD Capacitive Touchscreen

During driving, your family and friends can watch the TV show or movies with this multifunctional car radio which features a highly sensitive TFT HD capacitive touchscreen.

7 inch HD LCD capacitive monitor with resolution 1024 X 600, supports 1920 X 1080P and most video / audio file formats. Keep kids busy watching cartoons during long rides, watch your favorite TV show or movie with this MP5 player.

FM/AM Radio & Memory Function

FM: 87.5 MHz -107.9 MHz and AM: 52 KHz -1620 KHz radio frequency enables you to receive signal messages more reliably. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.

With this car radio you can enjoy stable reception, clear sound and a switchable tuner function even on the highway or in bad weather. Listen to your favorite radio shows in Europe, the USA and South America.

Steering Wheel Control

You can use the vehicle’s steering wheel buttons to answer and end calls, play music, switch modes and much more, all of which make your journey more comfortable.

Simply connect the SWC cable of your vehicle to the key1 or key2 cable of this device. Follow the instructions to learn the keys.

Note: If the SWC is a digital signal output (controlled by CANBUS), you will need to buy an SWC adapter that can convert digital signals to analog signals.

16-Band EQ Audio Setting

The car audio system- high sound quality experience for you

With a built-in preset EQ and user customized 16-band EQ options, this multimedia system is ideal for a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. Crystal clear sound and easily adjustable volume for the complete experience.

Subwoofer Output

Pre-Amp and Subwoofer outputs allow you to expand your system by adding up to 2 amps and/or signal processors. Easily enhance your sound from your speakers and make sure no sound distortion at the maximum volume.

Subwoofer Output make it possible to provide seamless and smooth sound characteristics with dynamic, high impact bass that lets you hear and feel the music.

Stylish LED Buttons & Physical Buttons

7 colors that change automatically with the possibility of setting a unique one of your choice and a stylish design for the LED buttons of this multimedia system!

Physical buttons, especially the rotating volume control that makes it easier to use while driving.

Important tips before ordering

1. JOY-M005 is standard size fits most brands of car models, but it’s also recommended to make sure if your dash board opening size is one of the following three sizes (No matter amazonconfirmedfit shows your vehicle model fits or not), if yes, our stereo can match your car perfectly:

Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173*98mm(6.81*3.86inch)- standard size commonly used by some Ford, Lincoln, and Chevrolet. (Note: not include all, some car models are of special size, need to purchase frame installation)Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the Asian: 178*100mm(7*4inch)-standard size commonly used by some of Nissan, Hyundai, KIA and Honda. (Note: not include all , some car models are special size, need to purchase frame installation)Other common sizes: 190*116mm(7.48*4.57inch)

2. If your DASH BOARD opening size is not the above three, then you need to buy a double din DASH KIT that fits your car model.

The brand installation DOUBLE DIN DASH KIT opening size is 173(W)×98MM(H) (Metra, PAC, Scosche, etc.) that can match with our stereo perfectly or modify your dashboard when you install the stereo.

3. Some cars may also require two additional accessories to complete the installation:

Wire harness adapter for your car model. ( Used to transfer your factory harness and ISO stereo wiring harness)Radio antenna adapter for your car model.

4. The head unit has a memory function. If the ACC wire (red wire) and the B+ wire (yellow wire) are connected reversely during the installation, the product will have no memory function after the power is off.

5. The working voltage of this car stereo is 12V, it can’t be used for large trucks with 24V, and the car stereo will be damaged when the voltage is over 16V.

6. This car stereo does Not CarPlay or android auto function.

【Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-Clear MIC】The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, enables wireless streaming of music, calls, MP3 players and more. The built-in ultra-clear microphone realize clearer calls and more accurate voice control, never distract you from driving, ensure safer driving.
【Mirror Link for Android and iOS Phones】 The double din car stereo supports IOS & Android phone (no version limit) for mirror link function, mirror the screen of your smartphone and show Google Maps, Spotify, Youtube etc. in the car radio. Replacing the cell phone with a car screen to realize vehicle intelligence. (Please Note: 1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function. 2.Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.)
【Free reversing camera】The car radio supports the rear and front view and will display the image automatically when the vehicle shifts into reverse. HD night vision rear view camera is included, ultra-wide viewing angle of 170 ° and a fully waterproof design, helps to park more safely and easily.
【7 Inch Full Touch HD Capacitive Screen】 Functions with 1024 X 600 resolution 7 inch HD touch screen, support 1920 X 1080P video playback. High resolution screen quality, full capacitive touch screen for more sensitive and accurate operation. Physical buttons make it easier to use while driving, especially the rotating volume control.
【FM/AM Radio with Memory Function】 With FM radio that transmission power range is wider, signal coverage is wider, and more stations can be received, your journey is no longer boring. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.
【Important Tips】1. Please make sure if your dash board opening size fits our car stereo. If you find that our stereo size does not meet your dash size, please purchase a suitable dash kit. 2.Please read the instructions before installation and it is recommended to install at a professional car audio shop. 3. Some cars may also require two additional after accessories to complete the installation: Wire harness adapter and radio antenna adapter for your car model.
【Check Dash Board Size Fits】 No matter the garage search shows your vehicle model fits our car stereo or not, please read our stereo size carefully and measure your dashboard size, if the dimensions match one of the following three sizes, then our stereo will fit your model: ①Commonly used sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173×98mm(6.81×3.85inch); ②Commonly used sizes for car series in the Asian: 178×100mm(7×4inch); ③Other common sizes:190×116mm(7.48×4.56inch).
Ideal gift for special day like birthday, Father’s Day or Christmas, Thanksgiving Day.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $164.95 - $139.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:13 UTC – Details)


Experience the industy’s best cordless range with the VTech IS8151-5 DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone featuring Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on the VTech IS8151-5 DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers.
SUPER LONG RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET – Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home..Caller ID Announce – The handset and base announce the name of the caller, so you don’t have to scramble for the handset to see who’s calling. Expandable up to 12 handsets (uses IS8101 accessory handset)
SMART CALL BLOCKER AND CALLER ID ANNOUNCE – This system lets you block nuisance callers on the spot with one touch. What more, it can filter robocalls and unwanted call while allowing welcome calls to get through. For screen out robocalls, set it to ask the callers to press the pound key. For screen out unknown callers, set it to ask the callers to record their names and press the pound key. After your caller completes the request, the phone rings and announces the caller’s name. You then can choose to block or answer the call, or forward the call to the answering system.
BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL – Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, listen to a text message, respond to a text message with a voice respose and perform all the other actions these services offer.
DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE – This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
LARGE SCREENS, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD – High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen on handset and 3.5 inch screen on base make it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.

Read more

What’s a Smart Call Blocker?

This system lets you block nuisance callers on the spot with one touch. What’s more, it can filter unwanted calls while allowing welcome calls included automated calls from your trusted organizations to get through. For screen out robocalls, set it to ask the callers to press the pound key. For screen out unknown callers, set it to ask the callers to record their names and press the pound key. For important calls from hospitals or pharmacies, set their names under the Star Name list.

Easy to read and dial

2″ backlit display on handset and 3.5″ backlit display on base. High contrast text on the extra large screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low light conditions.

For additional peace of mind

Simply place a fully charged cordless handset in the base charging cradle can provide power to the system for making and receiving calls during an outage.

Designed for ease of use

  • 2.5mm headset jack
  • Belt clip
  • Push-to-talk key
  • Visual ringer

Read more

  • 200 name and number phonebook plus 4000 shared cellular phonebook
  • Caller ID announce (Note: use of Caller ID features requires subscription to Caller ID service from your service provider.)
  • Caller ID / Call waiting – store up to 50 name and number caller history
  • Full duplex speakerphone on handset and base
  • Siri, S Voice and Google Now access
  • Ringtone share – set your cordless phone to play your iPhone (iOS4.1 or later) ringtone
  • Mobile notifications (Note: feature available for compatible Android phones with OS version 2.3 or above. To use, you must first download the free Connect to Cell app from the Google Play app store.)
  • Intercom between handsets and base
  • Conference between an outside line and up to 4 cordless handsets
  • English/Spanish/French setup menu

4
Price: $164.95 - $139.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:13 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Welcome to AMTIFO Store

AMTIFO providing higher quality BACKUP CAMERAS. We know you will be pleased with our product.

AMTIFO was created to eliminate blind spots, make driving safer and easier for everyone.

We focus on providing higher quality BACKUP CAMERAS. Designed a variety of cameras, you can choose 4.3-inch, 5-inch, 7-inch and 10-inch systems according to your needs, wireless or wired, and even add more cameras to the system, multi-directional escort.We’re sure you’ll get the satisfied system for your family and help to ensure years of safty.

►【Easy Installation】Newly upgraded car camera that you only needs power to the 4.3 inch monitor or back up camera and you can get the stable and clear image.
►【HD 1080P Image】Rear view camera a multi-tasker that offers clear graphics at an affordable price. 1080P high definition resolution that offers clear picture quality even at night.150 degree, wide viewing angle provides you larger visible area for safety even at night.
►【Multi-function Backing Camera】Back up camera systems for car is IP69 waterproof, Switch Rear or front view etc function. Also upgraded camera that the bracket can be hidden under the license plate.
► 【Monitor Button Function】The reverse camera can turn on/off guide lines through the buttons of the monitor, move the guide lines to right, left, up and down and adjust the line width. Also 4.3 inch monitor can switch Brightness/Contrast/Saturation/Tint/Language and reset.
►AMTIFO A2 security camera for car provide 2-year warranty and Free tech support and replacement service. We know you will be pleased with this camera. If you have any questions，just contact us.

Read more

Guide Lines Adjustable

► Guide lines on/off

► Guide Line Up / Down Moving

► Adjust the guide line width of near side, to match the vehicle width.

►The width of the guide line will be adjusted from large to small.

Upgraded Backing Camera

► 6 Glass Lens.

► True Color Reproduction.

► Updated Chip for Rear View Camera.

Image Flip

►If you want to use this camera as a front-facing camera, you can cut a thin white wire from the extension of the camera to achieve

Read more

The installation is simple and convenient

►The monitor can be attach to the Dashboard. Also it can mount to windshield by the suction cup mount—–B085MT7YSJ (it not included)

IP69 Waterproof

► The waterproof standard of this camera is IP69.

► The highest and lowest temperature resistance is -22°F~176°F.

Accuracy – Top priority for parking

► The bigger the camera angle is, the more image distortion you get . which makes 150 degrees golden angle for parking.

► Together with the adjustable parking lines fit different heights camera installation place make a trusted parking assistant.

Product Description

DIY Backup Lines

Image Flid

With image flip function you can switch to facing view (front view).

150 Degree viewing Angle

►HD license plate camera with 150 degree viewing angle provide you with a broader visual angle.

HD 1080P Display

►Vivid Picture for Driving/Backup Use

HD Color Picture all the day

► The picture is color and clear at day or night.

IP69K Waterproof

►Durable waterproof camera works fine at any weather.

►【Very Easy to Install】Hitch rear view camera system is powered by connecting to reverse lights for reversing Or can be powered by directly connecting to a 12v source fuse box or cigarette lighter/power point/ignition switch for constantly use.
►【HD 1080P Monitor 】Monitor of wired back up camera system for car can be mount on dash or windshield mount. The guide lines can be ON/OFF.The rear camera system can be flipped between mirror and facing.
►【IP69K Waterproof Camera】Car backup camera system can be reverse camera, backup camera for truck system with 149 degree viewing angle and 6 LED lights. Night vision view clearly at night.rly at night.

Product Description

DIY Backup Lines

►The backup lines can be ON/OFF, the width can be adjusted, the backup lines can be moving to left and right, up and down.

Image Flid

►The default is mirror image for rear view.

With image flip function you can switch to facing view (front view).

150 Degree viewing Angle

►HD license plate camera with 150 degree viewing angle provide you with a broader visual angle.

HD 1080P Display

►Vivid Picture for Driving/Backup Use

HD Color Picture all the day

► The picture is color and clear at day or night.

IP69K Waterproof

►Durable waterproof camera works fine at any weather.

►【Very Easy to Install】Hitch rear view camera system is powered by connecting to reverse lights for reversing Or can be powered by directly connecting to a 12v source fuse box or cigarette lighter/power point/ignition switch for constantly use.
►【HD 1080P Monitor 】Monitor of wired back up camera system for car can be mount on dash or windshield mount. The guide lines can be ON/OFF.The rear camera system can be flipped between mirror and facing.
►【IP69K Waterproof Camera】Car backup camera system can be reverse camera, backup camera for truck system with 149 degree viewing angle and 6 LED lights. Night vision view clearly at night.rly at night.
►【Two-Year Technical Support and Quality Warranty】We provide best customer service and tech support with replacement (professional instruction are provided),just contact us.

From the brand

eRapta – Best Driving Partner

eRapta aims to improve our safety on the road.

Whether life or travel, our reversing camera is the car’s eye to secure your journey.

Backup Camera System Kit

High-Quality Backup Camera

Excellent license plate wired backup camera: designed for car,Pickup Truck,SUV,Minivan and Sedans. Work well on old cars,new cars or used cars.
Universal rear view camera:Suit for 12-24V DC Power. 26ft RCA video cable. It will work well if you radio,monitor,DVD player or screen has the RCA connector.
Crystal Clear Image Nice Night Vision: Pretty Clear Video,6 Glass Lens, 100% True Color Reproduction, 100% Updated Chip. Vivid Picture helps us to Drive or Reverse with a pleasant Mood. 8 LED lights do a great job to get a nice colorful image in the dark. Excellent parking camera for safe reversing and driving.
Easy to Install:Just need to connect camera’s power to reversing light,then connect the camera to your radio screen or monitor by 26ft RCA cable, Complete kits and easy installation save our time.
IP 69 Waterproof Level Reversing cam: Highly Waterproof backup camera kits. The camera is made by high-purity resin,with international standard IP69K waterproof.So you can use it daringly whatever it’s rainy/snowy/hot
Ideal Auto Backup camera:The camera can be adjusted up and down to find a angle you prefer, 149° Perfect View Angle Design, Rear License plate backing up camera design.
In the Box: 1x Camera, 1x AV cable ,1x Power cable ,1x Installation manual. eRapta support department will always be there for any consultation

License Plate Backup Camera

eRapta third-generation color technology to support all models access

Night vision

Bottom dispersion spherical lens, ultra-high and low temperature can work normally
